title: Hungary Industrial Production
description: Industrial Production in Hungary increased 11.30 percent in September of 2022 over the same month in the previous year. Industrial Production in Hungary averaged 4.63 percent from 1991 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 58.90 percent in April of 2021 and a record low of -36.90 percent in April of 2020. In Hungary, industrial production measures the output of businesses integrated in industrial sector of the economy such as manufacturing, mining, and utilities. This page provides - Hungary Industrial Production - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Hungarian Central Statistical Office
